import { element } from 'prop-types' import React from 'react' import { Container, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { desc } from '../services/getTranslation' export default function PokeInfo(props) { const flav = props.flavor_text[0] // console.log(flav) return (
{props.name}
Description:
{flav.flavor_text + desc} ) }
